sentences.en: A two - dimensional potential energy surface was presented to show the direct dissociation.
sentences.cn: 我们使用一二维的位能面来描述这个直接分解化学吸附过程.

sentences.en: Ammonium chloride under thermal dissociation forms ammonia and hydrogen chloride gases.
sentences.cn: 氯化铵在热力分解作用下形成氨和氯化氢气体.

sentences.en: Defining feature is dissociation of certain aspects of personality.
sentences.cn: 确定特徵是人格的某些样子的分离.

sentences.en: Halogens also have the necessary absorption in the ultraviolet and rapid dissociation.
sentences.cn: 卤素也具有吸收紫外线和分解快这两种特性.

sentences.en: Hammer grinder with high grinding rate can fully increase the starch dissociation rate.
sentences.cn: 锤式粉碎机,破碎率高,能充分提高淀粉的游离率.

sentences.en: HM demonstrated a striking single - dissociation between intelligence and declarative memory.
sentences.cn: HM的智能与陈述性记忆展现出显著的分裂.

sentences.en: Results: The recognition and preferred tests showed experimental dissociation. The perfect attitude was implicit.
sentences.cn: 结果: 再认测验和偏好测验出现了实验性分离,完美态度具有内隐性.

sentences.en: The acid dissociation constants of PAPAQ and PACPAQ were determined by spectrophotometric method.
sentences.cn: 用光度法测定TPAPAQ和PACPAQ的酸离解常数.

sentences.en: The antibiotic activity and valency connect with transfer efficiency and dissociation constant.
sentences.cn: 抗菌活性和抗生素效力与能量转移效率和解离常数有关.

sentences.en: The herniated discs of the dissociation may be distal in intervertebral space.
sentences.cn: 结论三维重建对腰椎间盘突出症有重要的诊断价值,可提供平片和横断位不易得到的解剖学信息.

sentences.en: The resulting rise in gas temperature may be sufficient to cause the dissociation of NF 3.
sentences.cn: 所导致的气体温度的上升可能足以导致NF3的分解.

sentences.en: The thermal dissociation of the potassium shale - potash system has been experimentally investigated.
sentences.cn: 通过实验探讨了富钾页岩+碳酸钾体系热分解反应过程.

sentences.en: The two components of memory were dissociated by a post - test dissociation procedure.
sentences.cn: 此两类记忆以[测验后分离法]分离.

sentences.en: The war between the sexes should not result in their complete dissociation from one another.
sentences.cn: 两性之间的对抗不应造成两者之间彻底的分裂。

sentences.en: Zhou , Li . ( 2008 ) . The Dissociation of egocentric mental rotation and allocentric mental rotation rotation effect.
sentences.cn: 〈自我和物体为参照系的心理旋转分离:内旋效应〉.

trans.tran_cn: 分离， 离解， 脱离关系，解体
trans.tran_en: the act of dissociating or the state of being dissociated
